gameModes.release

Class ReleaseSquare

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.model.AbstractType
      • common.model.AbstractSquare
        • common.model.AbstractContainer
          • gameModes.release.ReleaseSquare
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICopy, java.io.Serializable

    public class ReleaseSquare
extends AbstractContainer
    Class that contains elements of a release square. Release square is a square that can take in a six.
    Author:
    rlamsal-jdoc
